description.sun-moon:
The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and
Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or
Minus Ability.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and
Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or
Minus Ability.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and
Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or
Minus Ability.
description.sword-shield:
The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and
Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or
Minus Ability.

effect.full: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
